title: P.O.D. - The Awakening (2015) ak
description:
The Awakening is the upcoming tenth studio album by American Christian alternative metal band P.O.D.. Scheduled for release on August 21, 2015, the work shall be released via T-Boy/UMC.

Contents

    1 Critical reception
    2 Track listing
    3 Credits
    4 References

Critical reception
Professional ratings
Review scores
Source 	Rating
CCM Magazine 	4/5 stars

Awarding the album four out of five stars from CCM Magazine, Matt Conner states, they will "remain at the top", with Howard Benson's production, where it has the theme of a "central character coming to terms with his own mistakes...[giving the album] meaningful depth."
